channel.title: beginner on Bucket's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in beginner on Bucket's Notes

item.title: baby's first commands
item.description: pwd check current directory cd change directory ls see whats in this directory cat [file] to quickly view small files less [file] to quickly view large files nano [file] to quickly edit files Ctrl-C quit a program running in terminal mkdir [name] make a directory rm [name] delete a file rm -r [name] delete a directory and all contents cp [source] [destination] copy files around apt update then apt upgrade to update software apt install [package]
